Name: Bite Sized Puzzle
About the game: A point and click adventure about investigating your kitchen to see what you can find! There is no clear goal to the game so you will have to drag props and open drawers to figure out how to reach the end credits. The entire game can be beaten in less than five minutes with a bit of patience and curiosity!
